Author: Microsoft Developer
Title: Using Agentic Protocols (MCP, A2A, and NLWeb)
Description:
Find the full "AI Agents for Beginners" Course and code samples here ➡️ aka.ms/ai-agents-beginners Join the Discord to get your questions answered here ➡️ aka.ms/ai-agents/discord

In this lesson (11) we explore 3 different Agentic Protocols - Model Context Protocol (MCP), Agent to Agent (A2A), and NLWeb. We then look at code samples to see how to use them with our AI Agents.
